import "../css/Modal.css"; function Modal(props) { let visible = "hidden"; if (props.modal.visible) visible = "visible"; function handleClick() { props.closeModal(); } function handleEdit() {








; props.handleEdit(); } return props.modal.isEditable ? (
) : (

{props.modal.name}

{props.modal.description}

); } export default Modal;
